definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common

sentences.english: Ever heard of the Belladonna plant?
Belladonna and other poison plants have a long history of medical use.
sentences.chinese: 顛茄和其他毒性植物有着很長的藥用史。

sentences.english: And a passionate kiss has the same effect as belladonna in making our pupils dilate.
sentences.chinese: 接吻引起瞳孔放大，和顛茄的效果一樣。

sentences.english: What effect does element of heart inject belladonna have?
sentences.chinese: 心臟注射顛茄素有什麼作用？

sentences.english: Other names for belladonna include devil's herb and deadly nightshade.
sentences.chinese: 顛茄的其他名稱還包括魔鬼藥草和致命的茄屬植物。
一個很好的例子就是顛茄。

sentences.english: A history of prior belladonna medication may help to confirm the diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 顛茄類藥物的服用史可能有助於確定診斷。
